name: Janitorial Services
description: Commercial janitorial and cleaning services project

template.title: Commercial Janitorial Services Project
template.description: Comprehensive janitorial services including floor care, window cleaning, restroom maintenance, and general office cleaning for commercial facilities.

tasks.name: Site Assessment & Planning
tasks.notes: Initial walkthrough, assess cleaning requirements, identify high-traffic areas

tasks.name: Equipment & Supply Procurement
tasks.notes: Purchase cleaning chemicals, equipment, uniforms, and safety gear

tasks.name: Staff Training & Orientation
tasks.notes: Train staff on safety protocols, cleaning procedures, and customer service

tasks.name: Floor Stripping & Waxing - Lobby
tasks.notes: Strip old wax, deep clean, apply new base coat and finish coats

tasks.name: Floor Stripping & Waxing - Offices
tasks.notes: Office areas, conference rooms, and common spaces

tasks.name: Carpet Deep Cleaning
tasks.notes: Hot water extraction, stain treatment, deodorizing

tasks.name: Window Cleaning - Interior
tasks.notes: All interior windows, glass partitions, and mirrors

tasks.name: Window Cleaning - Exterior
tasks.notes: Ground level and accessible exterior windows

tasks.name: Restroom Deep Cleaning & Sanitization
tasks.notes: Disinfection, tile grout cleaning, fixture polishing

tasks.name: Daily Cleaning Routine Setup
tasks.notes: Establish daily cleaning schedules and quality standards

tasks.name: Quality Inspection & Client Walkthrough
tasks.notes: Final inspection with client, address any concerns, handover documentation
